title: Nijigaku’s Live! Day 2
detail_text: <:th_ch0208/>Our first day was so much fun, it was like a dream! I even had another live in my dreams~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Fufu, you were talking in your sleep last night, Emma.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Yeah, it seemed like you were really enjoying it~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Eeeh!? W-, wake me up when I do that~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Lanzhu is so jealous that you get to have a live in your dreams! Lanzhu wished Lanzhu had a dream like that too! Right, Setsuna?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Totally. It’s great to be able to do even one more live!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>You two probably were doing a live in yours as well. You were moving everywhere. They even woke us up, right, Rina?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>I was a little surprised. But Shizuku-san was patting me, so I fell asleep again almost instantly.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Fufu. Ophelia had a similar thing where she would move her legs around when she dreamed of going for a walk. So I’m somewhat used to it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>You two were flapping your arms as well, Miachi, Rinari~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Fufufu. They were holding hands when they were sleeping, weren’t they? It was so cute.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Your sleeping face looks just like a kid, you know, Miako~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Wha-...!? I’m not a kid!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>We might all have dreamt of doing a live at some point last night, even if we don’t remember it. But let’s not forget that today’s live is just getting started! Let’s form a circle!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Yeaaah!! Let’s go full throttle today~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
